ModMetaData.name: Justin's Raids
ModMetaData.author: Justiniankoi
ModMetaData.description: Decreases the odds of Mechanoid raids and allows raiders to attack in more extreme temperatures Mech Commonality Curve: 0, 0.4, 0.7, 0.9, 1 was 0, 1, 1.8, 2.2, 2.6 Human Raids: Allowed Temp -40 to 60 was -40 to 45 Sanguophages: Allowed Temp -5 to 60 was -5 to 45
